mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, AUTHORITY_NAME FROM users
SELECT USER_ID as userId, USER_NAME as userName, PASSWORD as password, AUTHORITY_CODE as authorityCode, AUTHORITY_NAME as authorityName FROM users

SELECT USER_ID AS userId, USER_NAME as userName, PASSWORD as password, AUTHORITY_CODE as authorityCode, AUTHORITY_NAME as authorityName FROM Users WHERE 1=1
AND USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND AUTHORITY_NAME = #{authorityName}
ORDER BY USER_ID
